name: Matthew Stedman
about: Why did I sign up to Goodsted? I believe that knowledge and resources are there to be shared, especially to those that need it most. The world has a lot of problems to tackle and the only way to solve these challenges are together, by being selfless with our time and our experience. I'm looking to help anyone build their ideas into products into companies, but I'll also be looking for any other initiatives to help make the world a better place! I'm passionate about: - Turning ideas into reality - The power of service to transform our World - Community is bigger than tech!
